mapper.insert:
insert into order_detail(name, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, amount) values
(#{od.name},#{od.image},#{od.orderId},#{od.dishId},#{od.setmealId},#{od.dishFlavor},#{od.amount})
mapper.select: select sum(od.number) as number ,od.name from order_detail od, orders o where o.id = od.order_id and status = 5 and order_time between #{begin} and #{end} group by name order by number limit 0, 10;
